text: @morningmika Bs - the spread of #COVID19 can now be directly blamed on all the protesters, rioters and looters- there’s no hope for grandma now. Reminder - that racist @JoeBiden was against all Travel Bans Trump imposed #WalkAwayFromDemocrats #BuildTheWall @MSNBC
